author: geirm
msg: Added support for 'dependency only' fetches.  On the command line,
specify -od such that only the dependencies of a package/version are
fetched and not the jar itself.
For ant, there is a 'onlydependencies' attribute.  ex :
The idea here is that when using jjar in a build scenario, you might want
to fetch the known dependencies of a project, and then build the project...

author: geirm
msg: Added test for the 'only dependencies' feature, and better notes in the

author: geirm
msg: Update to note the 'dependency-only' fetch feature.  Useful for build tools
when you want to fetch the dependencies of something from the repository
